item.title: Business Leaders Are Looking Inward to Bridge Talent Gaps
item.description: Companies are increasingly hiring internally to fill open roles.

item.title: Daymond John Reveals the Number One Reason New Businesses Don’t Survive
item.description: The FUBU founder and ‘Shark Tank’ star shared his favorite advice for entrepreneurs.

item.title: Small Businesses, Big Ouches. These 7 Weird Workplace Injuries Stand Out
item.description: An insurer’s accident report found half the incidents small business owners reported could have been avoided, especially the strangest ones.

item.title: Elon Musk’s Solution to Data Centers: Just Put Them in Space
item.description: Blasting data centers into orbit would come with its own challenges and potential advantages, but Musk says SpaceX is going to do it.

item.title: Most Gen-Z Employees See Traditional Career Paths Coming to an End
item.description: New survey data finds many Gen Zers pursuing multiple gigs as an alternative to long careers and working for a single employer.
